harlow.optimize_neighbourhood_calculation#

Comparison of different methods for reducing the optimzal neighbourhood calculation time. The different methods are compared for a given random seed to determine:

  • The surrogating wall clock time.

  • The loss of efficiency caused by the heuristic, if any.

  • That the optimizations are implemented correctly.
